recipe.title: Peanut Butter Slice
recipe.ingredient: 3/4 cup dark choc chips (dairy free for vegan)
recipe.step: Grease a small dish and line with grease proof paper. Turn on oven to 160 C. In a blender add all ingredients except choc chips. Blend until combined, then stir in 1/2 cup of choc chips with a spoon. Pour into prepared dish and sprinkle over the remaining choc chips. Place in oven for 40 minutes or until cooked. Cool in pan for 10 minutes then remove to cooling rack. Once cool cut into squares.
